review: Doctor was so helpful and good in dealing with my kid.My kid is always afraid of going to doctor but she was so friendly that my kid was waiting eagerly for the doctor in the follow up visit.Apart from this,her treatment for my kid's ailment is also good.She is very good with kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She was very good with baby, very accurate in her skills.am very satisfied with treatment .she was very friendly with baby.

tags: None
review: Dr Jasprit ma'am is a kind doctor....and have great concern with children.....I visited physically in hospital only once for my special child......and several times she adviced me on mobile calls as I could not brought my child to hospital.......thank a lot to Jasprit ma'am ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with has been brilliant so far. I do often visit Dr jaspreet for health issue /growth of my kid. Besides, expert in her field, she does possess a human touch especially for kids which distinguish her among all pediatrician I have come across. Very positive and prompt response you will get from her whenever you need any support for her. Thanks & regards Vishal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr. Jaspreet twice for our new born baby girl. First for jaundice and then cough treatment. We were quite worried as she was just a week old. She explained the treatment quite nicely and treated her with minimal medication . We strong recommend her. Thanks !

tags: None
review: **** ****** *** give time and explain everything, She also try to give minimum medicine and give best advice for child. Thankyou ...
